editionStmt.p: The initial version of this file was created from data kindly provided by the Ethiopic Manuscript Imaging Project directed by Steve Delamarter.

publicationStmt.publisher: Die Schriftkultur des christlichen Äthiopiens und Eritreas: Eine multimediale Forschungsumgebung / Beta maṣāḥǝft

licence.p: This file is licensed under the Creative Commons Attribution-ShareAlike 4.0.

msContents.summary: Images 5r-142l: Pauline Epistles. Images 5r-30r: Romans. Images 30r-72l: 1 and 2 Corinthians (the start of 2 Corinthians is covered by an illumination). Images 72l-80l: Galatians. Images 80l-88r: Ephesians. Images 88r-94r: Philippians. Images 94r-100l: Colossians. Images 100l-105r: 1 Thessalonians. Images 105r-108r: 2 Thessalonians. Images 108r-115l: I Timothy. Images 115l-119r: II Timothy. Images 119r-122r: Titus. Images 122r-124l: Philemon. Images 124l-142l: Hebrews, incomplete at the end (ilumination over text). Image 1r: pen trial using the first verse of the Epistle to the Romans. Image 2l: pen trial texts. Illuminations added recently over text. Varia: Image 143r: Excerpts from Praises of Mary and scribal writing exercises on the alphabet and pen trials, in which a scribe identifies himself, ገብረ ሕይወት.

revisionDesc.change: Created XML record from EMIP Collection Metadata.xsls
